title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, changes that were made to the package view are immediately applied.
OB: After creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered.  When the working set dialog is opened again and a second working set is created, deleting the first working set does not reflect the changes made to the package view.
EB: After deleting the first working set, the package view should no longer be filtered and should reflect the changes made to the package view in the second working set.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
4. Verify that the package view is no longer filtered and reflects the changes made in the second working set.
